title: Web & Mobile Development
subtitle: Custom web and mobile applications tailored to your business needs and optimized for exceptional user experience
description: We design and develop high-performance, scalable web and mobile applications perfectly aligned with your business objectives.
overview: Our expert team guides businesses through the design and development of custom digital solutions. From responsive web applications to native mobile apps, we master the full spectrum of modern technologies to create exceptional user experiences.
With over 50 projects delivered for clients across various sectors (healthcare, education, transportation, services), we transform your ideas into performant and sustainable digital solutions.

title: Data & Business Intelligence Solutions
subtitle: Transform your data into strategic insights with custom dashboards and analytics tools
description: We develop data analysis and business intelligence solutions tailored to your business needs for informed decision-making.
overview: Our data experts guide you in maximizing the value of your data through analysis, visualization, and reporting solutions tailored to your business challenges. We create interactive dashboards, robust data pipelines, and decision support systems.
From collection to visualization, through processing and analysis, we master the entire data value chain to help you make the best business decisions.

features.title: Custom Dashboards
features.description: Interactive visualizations tailored to your KPIs

features.title: Data Warehousing
features.description: Centralization and structuring of your data

features.title: Multi-Source Integration
features.description: Connect to your databases and APIs

benefitsList: Custom dashboards with Power BI, Tableau, or custom solutions
ctaTitle: Unlock the Value of Your Data
ctaDescription: Discover how to transform your data into competitive advantage

title: Custom Business Software Development
subtitle: Tailored software solutions to automate and optimize your specific business processes
description: We design custom business software that perfectly adapts to your processes and specific needs.
overview: Every business has unique needs. Our experts develop tailored software solutions that integrate perfectly with your business processes: ERP, CRM, management systems, specialized business platforms, internal tools, and more.
From analyzing your needs to production deployment, through design and development, we support you at every step to create the solution that truly fits you.
benefitsList: In-depth analysis of your business needs
ctaDescription: Let's explore how custom software can transform your business

title: Cloud & Infrastructure Services
subtitle: Consulting, setup and management of secure, high-performance and optimized cloud infrastructures
description: We guide you in designing, deploying and optimizing your cloud infrastructure for performance and security.
overview: Our DevOps team helps you design and implement modern, secure and high-performance cloud infrastructures. Cloud migration, multi-cloud architecture, containerization, CI/CD, monitoring - we master the entire cloud ecosystem.
Whether you want to migrate to the cloud, optimize your existing infrastructure or implement DevOps practices, we support you with expertise and pragmatism.

features.title: Cloud Migration
features.description: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud - Secure migration

ctaDescription: Discover how to optimize your cloud infrastructure with our experts

title: Digital Strategy & Consulting
subtitle: Strategic support to define and successfully execute your digital transformation
description: We support you in defining and implementing your digital strategy for concrete and measurable results.
overview: Before launching a digital project, it's essential to define a clear strategy aligned with your business objectives. Our consultants support you in auditing your existing setup, defining your digital roadmap and managing your projects.
From technical audit to architecture definition, through technology selection and project management, we bring you the expertise needed to make the right decisions.

features.title: Technical Audit
features.description: Analysis of your IT systems and opportunity identification

features.title: Technology Selection
features.description: Advice on suitable technologies and tools

features.title: ROI Optimization
features.description: Maximizing value of your IT investments

ctaDescription: Let's discuss your challenges and objectives to build your roadmap

title: Security & Compliance
subtitle: Secure your applications and data with cybersecurity and regulatory compliance solutions
description: We secure your applications and infrastructures while ensuring compliance with regulations.
overview: Data security and regulatory compliance are critical issues. Our cybersecurity experts support you in securing your applications, GDPR compliance, and implementing security best practices.
Security audit, penetration testing, compliance implementation, identity management, encryption - we cover all aspects of application and infrastructure security.

features.title: Security Audit
features.description: Complete analysis of your current security
